NAME: Name
CHAR_MIN: The name of the harbor must have, at least, three characters
POINT_NULL: The latitude and longitude must have a valid value to search by area
ONLY_NUMBERS_POSITIVE: This field only accept positive numbers
10001: At least, the name of the vessel or the data of the area (latitude, longitude and radius) have to be filled to do a search
10002: At least, there is a validation error that need to be solved
10003: An unexpected error has happened. Ask help to the system administrator
